on_lot_handle_prompt: Start 10–15 feet back to show presence, then move to premium touchpoints (seat feel, cabin materials, lighting, display quality).
translate_line: What that means for you is a vehicle that represents you the moment you arrive.
benefit_close: This isn't just transportation—it's a statement you don't have to explain.
service_response_script: It's easy to see you've taken great care of your vehicle. This helps maintain that level of excellence—performance, smoothness, and appearance. Staying ahead like this protects what you've built, and it shows over time.
best_menu_fits: GDI/Fuel Injection Service; Major Service Packages (60K/120K); Appearance/Protection add-ons (as applicable).
coach_prompt: Coach for one 'show then translate' moment (30 sec) + one clean close line. No over-explaining.

on_lot_handle_prompt: Demonstrate convenience and readiness: quick access/remote functions, easy seat-fold/cargo flexibility, and simple tech that supports their day.
translate_line: What that means for you is fewer obstacles and more control day-to-day.
benefit_close: This supports your schedule—not the other way around.
service_response_script: This is preventive—it helps you avoid issues that cost time and create stress. It's about keeping your vehicle dependable so you can just go.
best_menu_fits: Transmission Service; Brake Fluid; Spark Plugs; Cooling System Service; Preventive Maintenance bundles.
coach_prompt: Coach a 15-second 'why now' explanation: freedom + reliability + fewer surprises.

on_lot_handle_prompt: Use a simple value path: show what changes between trims, highlight the 'best value' step-up, and keep it ROI-focused.
translate_line: What that means for you is getting the most return from every dollar you spend.
benefit_close: This is the choice that still feels smart years from now.
service_response_script: I'm recommending this because it reduces your long-term cost and helps prevent bigger repairs later. We can show you what we're seeing, explain the why, and keep it simple so you can make the smartest decision.
best_menu_fits: Factory Scheduled Maintenance; Filters/Fluids when due; Alignment (when indicated); Battery test/replace (when indicated).
coach_prompt: Coach: replace 'trust me' with 'here's why' + one visual proof point.

on_lot_handle_prompt: Point out safety systems and how they work in plain English, then connect it to 'less stress every trip'.
translate_line: What that means for you is less stress—and more confidence every trip.
benefit_close: Peace of mind isn't optional—it's built into the plan.
service_response_script: This recommendation is about safety and predictability. Brakes and tires don't just affect the car—they protect you and the people riding with you. Taking care of it now keeps that peace of mind every day.
best_menu_fits: Brake Service; Tires; Alignment; Battery; Wipers/Lights; Safety inspections and priority repairs.
coach_prompt: Coach: always tie safety item to 'predictability + peace of mind' without fear language.

on_lot_handle_prompt: Create a delight moment: premium seat comfort, quiet cabin, favorite song, ambient/comfort settings, short loop drive.
translate_line: What that means for you is enjoying the drive, not just owning the vehicle.
benefit_close: You've worked hard—this should feel like it.
service_response_script: This is about keeping the vehicle performing and feeling the way you love it. Staying ahead on maintenance protects ride quality and smoothness so it continues to feel special every day.
best_menu_fits: Premium maintenance packages; Detail/appearance care; Wheel/Tire protection conversations (as applicable).
coach_prompt: Coach: don't oversell—help them 'feel it' with one memorable moment.

on_lot_handle_prompt: Have them physically try row 2 and row 3, then show cargo flexibility for real-life gear (stroller/cooler/sports bags).
translate_line: What that means for you is everyone gets a good seat—and the plan actually works.
benefit_close: This makes shared time and family life easier.
service_response_script: This is a trip-readiness recommendation. When maintenance is up to date, plans don't get interrupted and everyone stays comfortable and safe.
best_menu_fits: Road-trip inspections; Tires/Brakes; Cooling system checks; Alignment; Scheduled maintenance for reliability.
coach_prompt: Coach: 'we language'—make it about everyone riding comfortably and reliably.
